```{r}
library(data.table)
library(sf)
library(sp)
library(raster)
library(dplyr)
library(rgdal)
library(rgeos)

extent(landcover)
e <- as(extent(460000, 465000, 4980000, 4990000), 'SpatialPolygons')

xrange <-  521239.5 - 419971.5 
yrange <- 5029162 -  4924218



crs(landcover)
crs(e) <- "+proj=utm +zone=15 +ellps=GRS80 +towgs84=0,0,0,0,0,0,0 +units=m +no_defs"
crs(e)
cropped2 <- raster::crop(landcover,e)
plot(cropped2, axes = TRUE)

xmax <- 521239.5
ymax <- 5029162
xrange <-  521239.5 - 419971.5 
yrange <- 5029162 -  4924218
xcroprange <- 5000
ycroprange <- 4990000 - 4980000
yincrement <- yrange/10
xincrement <- xrange/10



e <- as(extent(460000, 465000, 4980000, 4990000), 'SpatialPolygons')


#xmin, xmax, ymin, ymax

crop1 <- as(extent(xmax - xincrement, xmax, ymax - yincrement, ymax), 'SpatialPolygons')
crop2 <- as(extent(xmax - 2*xincrement, xmax - increment, ymax - 2*yincrement, ymax - yincrement), 'SpatialPolygons')
crop3 <- as(extent(xmax - 3*xincrement, xmax - 2*increment, ymax - 3*yincrement, ymax - 2*yincrement), 'SpatialPolygons')
crop4 <- as(extent(), 'SpatialPolygons')
crop5 <- as(extent(), 'SpatialPolygons')
crop6 <- as(extent(), 'SpatialPolygons')
crop7 <- as(extent(), 'SpatialPolygons')
crop8 <- as(extent(), 'SpatialPolygons')
```
